entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or ice pellets overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Freezing drizzle. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Ice pellets changing to freezing drizzle in the morning then to drizzle in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Drizzle ending in the evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
